author: Melissa Roberto
title: Prince Charles, Camilla virtually clap for health care workers fighting coronavirus after royal's diagnosis
description: Prince Charles virtually reunited with his wife, Camilla, on Thursday while the pair remain in isolation in Scotland following his diagnosis of the novel coronavirus.
content:
